pageTitle: SLITS In the Beginning 1977-81 Punk girls Ari Up new CD | eBay
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {70513=The album spans from an early, chaotic 1977 punk-era show which includes their classics such as ‘Shoplifting’, ‘New Town’ and ‘Love & Romance’, shows how they evolved into their dubby, reggae-influenced style with songs such as ‘Typical Girls’, and finishes with a track from their last ever performance in 1981. , 75702=Budgie was replaced by Bruce Smith of The Pop Group, with which group grew an association with both a shared single and managers Christine Robertson and Dick O’Dell.  In 1980 indie singles ‘In The Beginning There Was Rhythm’, ‘Man Next Door’ and ‘Animal Space’ followed.  Musicianship became more of a priority, with Steve Beresford accompanying them, and a more experimental, world music spirit permeated their work.  Then a new contract with CBS produced the ‘Return Of The Giant Slits’ album in October 1981.  Two months later, they held their final gig at Hammersmith Palais, announcing that they had no more plans as a group., 73948=After a few gigs they were invited by the Clash to support them on the ‘White Riot’ tour.  The band quickly acquired a violent, chaotic image, attacking bands like Sore Throat and Throbbing Gristle on stage, and chosen by Derek Jarman to trash cars in his 1977 film ‘Jubilee’.  Their music fitted the image - shambolic and loud, with abrasive guitar, shouted choruses, and crazy Ari’s screeched vocals over Palmolive’s hammered, stuttering drums., 74456=Their uncompromising attitude, combined with gleefully subverting any and every notion of traditional female behaviour - skirts raised over heads, obscene and aggressive gestures, indeed anything to put the shits up people - scared the A&R men away.  Peel Sessions in ’77 and ’78 was all the public got to hear, apart from gigs, which included tours with the Buzzcocks and Rich Kids.  Other punk bands who’d taken their time - Siouxsie & The Banshees, Adam & The Ants - eventually got signed in 1978, but not the unpredictable, unmanageable Slits., 69868=Debuting with their 1977 tour with The Clash, The Slits were known for their uncompromising attitude and aggressive and confrontational music; to this day they are cited as being hugely inspiring to many female artists. , 76787=SMALL PRINT: Payment Paypal is smoothly integrated into ebay, and works well.  If you don’t have PayPal or want to pay by credit-card, you can still do so through PayPal.  Just don’t log into an account, and look for the button saying ‘Pay by credit-card’.  We also accept cheques from UK banks in Pounds Sterling, and UK Postal Orders.  Checks in US Dollars from US banks can be accepted with a $3 surcharge.  PayPal eCheques and orders paid by any method outside of PayPal may take longer to process and be subject to delays. Postage UK and particularly international postage charges have risen sharply (May 2012).  The amount we charge is what we expect to pay plus approx 20-30p for packing materials.  Multiple items postage If you are ordering multiple items, there will be automatic approximated reduction in postage costs – but make sure you order them together, not individually.  If the estimate still looks excessive, don't pay but click on the 'Request total from seller' button in the shopping basket.  We'll then recalculate the costs for your combined items postage and send you an invoice.  The postage may or may not calculate as less; we’re trying to refine the accuracy of the automation. (Note: the date printed on our postage is two days after we print it, ie the date it remains valid until with Royal Mail.) Problem? We want you to be really happy with your purchase.  If you’re not, or something’s gone wrong, please message us.  We will do our very best to resolve any problem.  If our item description isn’t quite right, or you think we’ve overcharged on postage, please let us know instead of marking down our ebay feedback.  If you have an order problem you’d like to resolve quickly, you can try phoning us on +44(0)208 537 3445.  Good manners are appreciated! Ebay Messaging The ebay messaging system doesn’t include your name, date of purchase or payment, or even the order reference number.  It’ll help us deal with your query faster if you can include those.  Please remember, the ebay shop is not our main business so we may not always respond immediately; but we will get back to you., 75077=Record companies telling them they ‘weren’t tight enough’ led them to part company with Palmolive and her trademark drum style.  Her replacement was Budgie from seminal Liverpool group Big In Japan (later a Banshee and Creature).  But by the time of their long-awaited debut album ‘Cut’ on Island in 1979, they had become bored with punk.  They embraced reggae, working with producer Dennis Bovell, who pared down their songs and gave them a dubby mix.  The sleeve, showing them proudly and defiantly naked and covered in mud, guaranteed them attention., 70191=But even their seminal Island Records 1979 debut album ‘Cut’, with its infamous sleeve featuring the band members naked and caked in mud, does not capture the true energy and spontaneity as well as these live recordings do. , 69529=THE SLITS ‘IN THE BEGINNING’ (A Live Anthology 1977-81)}
